item.title: Installation
Usage
item.description: List snapshots Use the list action to list all snapshots where the given file was modified. main‚ü© zsd go.mod list scan the last 7 days for other file versions # | Snapshot | Snapshot age ----------------------------------------------------------- 0 | zfs-auto-snap_hourly-2020-02-12-12h00U | 5 hours 1 | zfs-auto-snap_hourly-2020-02-12-09h00U | 8 hours Show file content Use the cat action to show the file content from the given snapshot. You can use the snapshot number from the list output or the snapshot name to select a snapshot.

item.title: Contact / Support
item.description: Contact Check my GitHub Profile for my mail address. Send me an direct message on twitter. Use keybase to contact me. Support If you have any questions, trouble or other input, feel free to contact me directly (see Contact) or open a issue@github.
